verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that came to <S%H4318>Micah<s%> the <S%H4183>Morasthite<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3147>Jotham<s%>, <S%H271>Ahaz<s%>, and <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%>, <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, which he <S%H2372>saw<s%> concerning <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

<S%H8085>Hear<s%>, all ye <S%H5971>people<s%>; <S%H7181>hearken<s%>, O <S%H776>earth<s%>, and all that <S%H4393>therein<s%> is: and let the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> be <S%H5707>witness<s%> against you, the <S%H136>Lord<s%> from his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple<s%>. all ye: Heb. ye people, all of them all that: Heb. the fulness thereof

For, behold, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> cometh <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of his <S%H4725>place<s%>, and will come <S%H3381>down<s%>, and <S%H1869>tread<s%> upon the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall be <S%H4549>molten<s%> under him, and the <S%H6010>valleys<s%> shall be <S%H1234>cleft<s%>, as <S%H1749>wax<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%>, and as the <S%H4325>waters<s%> that are <S%H5064>poured<s%> down a steep <S%H4174>place<s%>. a steep: Heb. a descent

For the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is all this, and for the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>. What is the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>? is it not <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>? and what are the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>? are they not <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>?

Therefore I will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> as an <S%H5856>heap<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and as <S%H4302>plantings<s%> of a <S%H3754>vineyard<s%>: and I will pour <S%H5064>down<s%> the <S%H68>stones<s%> thereof into the <S%H1516>valley<s%>, and I will <S%H1540>discover<s%> the <S%H3247>foundations<s%> thereof.

And all the graven <S%H6456>images<s%> thereof shall be beaten to <S%H3807>pieces<s%>, and all the <S%H868>hires<s%> thereof shall be <S%H8313>burned<s%> with the <S%H784>fire<s%>, and all the <S%H6091>idols<s%> thereof will I <S%H7760>lay<s%> <S%H8077>desolate<s%>: for she <S%H6908>gathered<s%> it of the <S%H868>hire<s%> of an <S%H2181>harlot<s%>, and they shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H868>hire<s%> of an <S%H2181>harlot<s%>.

Therefore I will <S%H5594>wail<s%> and <S%H3213>howl<s%>, I will <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H7758>stripped<s%> <S%H7758><s%> and <S%H6174>naked<s%>: I will <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H4553>wailing<s%> like the <S%H8577>dragons<s%>, and <S%H60>mourning<s%> as the <S%H1323>owls<s%> <S%H3284><s%>. owls: Heb. daughters of the owl

For her <S%H4347>wound<s%> is <S%H605>incurable<s%>; for it is <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; he is <S%H5060>come<s%> unto the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>, even to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>. her: or, she is grievously sick of her wounds

<S%H5046>Declare<s%> ye it not at <S%H1661>Gath<s%>, <S%H1058>weep<s%> ye not at <S%H1058>all<s%>: in the house of <S%H1036>Aphrah<s%> <S%H6428>roll<s%> <S%H6428><s%> thyself in the <S%H6083>dust<s%>. Aphrah: that is, Dust

Pass ye <S%H5674>away<s%>, thou <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H8208>Saphir<s%>, having thy <S%H1322>shame<s%> <S%H6181>naked<s%>: the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H6630>Zaanan<s%> came not <S%H3318>forth<s%> in the <S%H4553>mourning<s%> of <S%H1018>Bethezel<s%>; he shall <S%H3947>receive<s%> of you his <S%H5979>standing<s%>. thou: or, thou that dwellest fairly inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress Zaanan: or, The country of flocks Bethezel: or, A place near

For the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H4796>Maroth<s%> waited <S%H2342>carefully<s%> for <S%H2896>good<s%>: but <S%H7451>evil<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> unto the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>. inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress waited: or, was grieved

O thou <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H3923>Lachish<s%>, <S%H7573>bind<s%> the <S%H4818>chariot<s%> to the swift <S%H7409>beast<s%>: she is the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin<s%> to the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>: for the <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H4672>found<s%> in thee. inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress

Therefore shalt thou <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H7964>presents<s%> to <S%H4182>Moreshethgath<s%>: the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H392>Achzib<s%> shall be a <S%H391>lie<s%> to the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>. to: or, for Moreshethgath Achzib: that is, A lie

Yet will I <S%H935>bring<s%> an <S%H3423>heir<s%> unto thee, O <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H4762>Mareshah<s%>: he shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H5725>Adullam<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>. inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress he: or, the glory of Israel shall, etc

Make thee <S%H7139>bald<s%>, and <S%H1494>poll<s%> thee for thy <S%H8588>delicate<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%>; <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> thy <S%H7144>baldness<s%> as the <S%H5404>eagle<s%>; for they are gone into <S%H1540>captivity<s%> from thee.
